reviewText:
Once I discovered the fabulous Rosamund Bernier, finding her various lecture tapes and enjoying her biography, "Some of My Lives",  became an addiction and I ordered multiple copies for holiday gifts - all of the recipients agreeing that she has led a full and  fascinating life worth reading about.  Her sojourn in Paris, meeting Picasso, Matisse, and other artists with whom she became friends once her initial interviews took place- all interesting and revealing about her and the artists she met.

Louise A. Marasso, A.S.I.D., Realtor, Sotheby's International Realty

I really enjoyed this dvd.  It was done in the 80's in a lecture hall at the Met therefore the quality is what it is.  If you can look past that, it's full of great info.  She clearly loved art and her subject.
